cells.data:
**Rocket Skates** -- I see the cert info in Vault and Consul KV post-creation, but #gog-certs never came in!

**Rocket Skates** -- Why did I have to bounce `rocket-skates-agent` manually on Envoy nodes to have a new cert placed there? Is this some order of operations thing?

**Cable** -- Why do we need to force a cable refresh for new VMs in scalesets?

**Envoy** -- For a new node, had to change ownership of `/datadrive/var/log/envoy/access_logs/ingress_stats_proxy.log`: root:root -> envoy:envoy
